direction.description: (Only for transfers) Optional parameter for token transfers ("incoming", "outgoing"), if account param exists

symbols.description: (Only for transfers) Optional array of symbol objects

blockIndex.description: Index of block where transaction is

data.description: Action data in parsed json format, or string in the "raw" field

total.description: Total count of items in list
Total count of items in list

token.description: JWT token, it has 1 week lifetime

account.description: Account to accept migrated funds (can be account name or public key)

status.description: User status: 0 - pending, 1 - request verified, 2 - accepted, 3 - rejected
User migration status: 1 - request verified, 2 - accepted, 3 - rejected

key.description: Hard-coded key of a particular environment variable (MAINTENANCE_MODE)

value.description: Value, in JSON format, can be: true, 1, "message", {"param": "value"}

type.description: One of values: [number, boolean, string, object, array]

isSuperAdmin.description: If "true", then admin can modify another admin records

enabled.description: Displays if this admin is enabled

password.description: New admin password (8 symbols with one upper, lower and digit)

total.description: Total count of items in list

alreadyExisted.description: If "true", user with this email has already exist

errorDescription.example: This e-mail address cannot be used to register with ABBC Wallet. Please try another one not previously used with previous wallet versions.

addressTo.description: Either account name or public key for the new account to receive tokens from the last generation blockchain

account.description: account name or public key for the ABBC Gen.2 blockchain

count.description: The number of items to return
The number of items to return

addresses.description: Address which is tied up to user's wallet

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

confirmations.description: Number of confirmation applied to selected transaction

count.description: The number of items to return

confirmations.description: Number of confirmation applied to selected transaction

transactionCount.description: index of transaction on its address

gasLimit.description: estimated gas limit for given operation

address.description: Address which is tied up to user's wallet

to.description: Address where user needs to send funds

data.description: Special data for ERC-20 tokens support, for ETH it will be empty

price.description: Low fee which is possible to calculate transaction with

time.description: Average wait time in ms for low fee

dust.description: Min amount (in satoshi), which can be transferred by currencies

addresses.description: Address which is tied up to user's wallet

balance.description: Balance of smart contract address in wei

totalSupply.description: Total supply of the token (in whole tokens, NOT IN NEM-satoshi)

balance.description: Balance of smart contract address in NEM-satoshi

addresses.description: Address which is tied up to user's wallet

amount.description: Amount of tokens on user's addresses

hasIncomingTransaction.description: Array of booleans which shows if address on this position has at least one incoming transaction

timestamp.description: Approximate timestamp to return rate to, supported up to now-24hrs (millis)

errorDescription.example: There is no address with completed migration
All addresses for promo campaign are already added

value.description: Email or phone, depended on type
